DOC.brief_title: Hydrogel Balloon Assisted Intracranial Aneurysm Coiling Registry
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single arm , single center study patient rupture unruptured saccular aneurysm embolized use MicroVention second-generation hydrogel coil undergo balloon remodel MicroVention Scepter Occlusion Balloon Catheter . Data patient collect 6 ± 3 month post-procedure study .

Patient patient 's legally authorize representative provide write informed consent . Patient willing comply study followup requirement . Inability obtain informed consent .
